title: Shazam! Is Almost Here
body:
Shazam! arrives in theaters April 2019! Are you excited?

“Shazam!” said Gomer Pyle countless times in reference to the catchphrase of one of comics’ greatest curiosities: Captain Marvel. No, not the one that looks like Brie Larson, the original Captain Marvel, now known as Shazam.

Shazam derives as an acronym from a revolving door of legendary figures, but from the trailer it doesn’t look like they’ll go that route. This trailer does promise the…

View On WordPress

summary: Captain Marvel Meet and Greet Coming to Disney Cruise Line in 2019
title: Captain Marvel Meet and Greet Coming to Disney Cruise Line in 2019
body:
Captain Marvel Meet and Greet Coming to Disney Cruise Line in 2019

Today, Disney announced that Disney Cruise Line guests will be the first to meet Captain Marvel when she makes her meet and greet debut during exclusive Marvel Day at Sea sailings in 2019!

For the first time ever, guests will encounter one of the most powerful heroes in the Marvel universe as part of an action-packed, day-long celebration aboard select Disney Magic sailings departing Jan. 6…

View On WordPress

blog.name: bringbackgenisvellandphylavell
blog.title: Bring back Genis and Phyla Vell
blog.description:
Site dedicated to all things Genis-Vell and Phyla-Vell. Former Captains Marvel and son and daughter of the original one, Mar-Vell. They were killed off very soon by Marvel and they deserve a second chance, we don't ask about a new chance as Captains Marvel but to come back to the Cosmic Marvel Universe (Quasar, Photon, Legacy, Martyr, whatever). 

Posts about Genis and Phyla. Mar-Vell, Rick Jones, Guardians of the Galaxy, Adam Warlock, Quasar, Thanos, Starlin stuff, some Avengers and a lot of Cosmic stuff. Welcome!

summary: Do you consider Carol Danvers a cosmic character?
title: Do you consider Carol Danvers a cosmic character?
body: She had some cosmic adventures (as Binary and as Captain Marvel with the Guardians, her own comic and recently with the Alpha Flight and stuff) but is she a Cosmic character?

reblog.comment: She had some cosmic adventures (as Binary and as Captain Marvel with the Guardians, her own comic and recently with the Alpha Flight and stuff) but is she a Cosmic character?

summary: Captain Marvel coming to Disneyland Paris and Disney Cruise Line
title: Captain Marvel coming to Disneyland Paris and Disney Cruise Line
body:
Disney announced several new locations for guest to meet Captain Marvel, one of which will be at Disneyland Paris during the Marvel Season of Super Heroes from March 23 to June 16, 2019.

Captain Marvel will also be heading out to see aboard the Disney Magic sailings departing Jan. 6 through March 8 from Miami.

Via the Disney Parks Blog:

Captain Marvel joins the event’s awesome line-up of Super Heroes and villains, including Iron Man, Captain America, Black Widow, Thor, Loki, Spider-Man, Black Panther, Doctor Strange and more. With this VIP list of heroes, even Tony Stark would be envious!

Captain Marvel hits theaters on March 8, 2019

Captain Marvel coming to Disneyland Paris and Disney Cruise Line was originally published on

summary: Captain Marvel Meet & Greet to Debut During 2019 Marvel Day at Sea Cruises
title: Captain Marvel Meet & Greet to Debut During 2019 Marvel Day at Sea Cruises
body:
Captain Marvel Meet & Greet to Debut During 2019 Marvel Day at Sea Cruises

Disney Cruise Line just announced some big news for Marvel fans. Captain Marvel will be joining the epic line-up of super heroes aboard the Disney Magic in 2019 during the Marvel Day at Sea cruises. That’s right, the Disney Magic will have yet another Captain.

Disney Cruise Line guests will be the first to meet Captain Marvel when she makes her debut during Marvel Day at Sea. For the first time…

blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers Requested by: Jessica Drew Telephone networks have failed, the internet is...
caption:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers
Requested by: Jessica Drew

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone. Modern communication seems to have come to an end. What remains is radiowaves. People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on. Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

Carol slowly tuned through the channels on the old radio, she had crash landed on her reentry into the Earth’s atmosphere, and when she made it to Manhattan, the Tower was a wreckage. She heard the crackling sound of numbers coming through as she found an active channel –

This is Jessica Drew broadcasting for Carol Danvers. On the off chance you’re not in space and you’re out there, there’s somewhere safe. Haven. I’m here with Gerry. Clint is here. And Peter. Nat, Bobbi, Tony… I’ve saved you a room so you better get your ass here before someone steals it. Hope to see you soon! Love you, Kirk. Co-ordinates to follow…

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

summary: last night I had this weird ass dream that I was at a baseball stadium with a bunch of small children I knew and Sebastian Stan...
body:
last night I had this weird ass dream that I was at a baseball stadium with a bunch of small children I knew and Sebastian Stan bought us all pretzels unprovoked and said something like I’m your dad now

Why is this one of the few dreams I can Actually remember
